resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106009</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106009</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085978</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Science students get their hands dirty</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft Kursteilnehmer erhalten ihre Hände 
schmutzig</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants de la Science obtiennent leurs 
mains modifiées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes da ciência começam suas mãos 
sujas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi di scienza ottengono le loro mani 
sporche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές επιστήμης παίρνουν τα χέρια τους 
βρώμικα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes de la ciencia consiguen sus manos 
sucias</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Enter Carol Swink's classroom where students become scientists by conducting hands-on, inquiry-based investigations. By saving the textbook reading and lectures for last and doing experiments first, students master not only science content but math content too.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betreten Sie Klassenzimmer Lied Swinks, in dem 
Kursteilnehmer Wissenschaftler werden, indem sie Blindeinschub leiten,
Anfrage-gegründete Untersuchungen. Indem sie zuerst den 
Lehrbuchmesswert und -vorträge für Letztes sichern und Experimente 
tun, erarbeiten Kursteilnehmer nicht nur Wissenschaft Inhalt aber 
Matheinhalt auch.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Entrez dans la salle de classe de Swink de hymne 
de louange où les étudiants deviennent des scientifiques par la 
conduite à commande manuelle, investigations enquête-basées. 
En sauvegardant la lecture et les conférences de manuel pour le
bout et en faisant des expériences d'abord, les étudiants 
maîtrisent non seulement le contenu de la science mais le contenu de 
maths aussi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Entre na sala de aula onde os estudantes se 
transformam cientistas conduzindo hands-on, investigações 
inquérito-baseadas de Swink do carol. Conservando a leitura e 
os lectures do textbook para o último e fazendo experiências 
primeiramente, os estudantes dominam não somente o índice da 
ciência mas o índice do math demasiado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Entri nell'aula in cui gli allievi diventano 
scienziati conducendo hands-on, indagini inchiesta-basate dello Swink 
del carol. Salvando la lettura e le conferenze del manuale per 
l'ultimo e facendo gli esperimenti in primo luogo, gli allievi 
acquistano padronanza non soltanto del soddisfare di scienza ma del 
soddisfare di per la matematica anche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισάγετε την τάξη της Carol Swink's όπου οι 
σπουδαστές γίνονται επιστήμονες με τη διεξαγωγή των εμπράγματων, 
έρευνα-βασισμένων στον ερευνών. Με να σώσουν την ανάγνωση 
και τις διαλέξεις εγχειριδίων για τα τελευταία και να κάνουν 
πειράματα πρώτα, οι σπουδαστές κυριαρχούν όχι μόνο το 
περιεχόμενο επιστήμης αλλά math ικανοποιούν επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Entre en la sala de clase en donde los estudiantes
hacen científicos conduciendo con manos, investigaciones 
pregunta-basadas de Swink del carol. Salvando la lectura y las 
conferencias del libro de textos para el último y haciendo 
experimentos primero, los estudiantes dominan no solamente el 
contenido de la ciencia pero el contenido de la matemáticas también.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

    <identifier>
